channel.title: Illuminati, Money, and Power?
channel.description:
You want to learn about the Illuminati? Well, they control are media, and they brainwash all citizens of there country, and around the entire world. The rich are most likely to be picked by the Illuminati, because the Illuminati are after power, money, and war. To learn about the Illuminati, there are books, documentary's, and finally YouTube.
I'm a Muslim, I've learned fairly enough about the illuminati, they ways they act, by deceiving and manipulating people. Go to YouTube, search for "[B][I]The Arrivals[/I][/B]". Anything, or everything you'd like to know will be explained.
Here is a link: [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=le_ySMrOkFU"]The Beginning![/URL]
Watch this comedian, what he says is important.
Redirect: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7pVDXxt43Gk]YouTube.com[/url]

item.title: Illuminati, Money, and Power?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:20, topic:410180”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=511463.msg3711562#msg3711562 date=1313375876]

Yes, and Aliens built the pyramids, the Free Masons secretly control the world, artificial sweeteners are safe, WMDs are in Iraq, and Anna Nicole Smith married for love!

“Aliens” could have helped build the pyramids, the cuts they made on the stone peices can’t even be recreated today, the free masons were part of early governments, guess who runs the world? Artificial sweeteners ARE safe, they were hyped up because they are cheaper to make and don’t make as much profit as regular sugars. There, half your sarcasm is pointless.
[/quote]
I don’t believe in Aliens in the same sense as the ones that could have helped build the pyramids. Early governments? The Freemasons weren’t founded until the 16th/17th century. The only government that could really apply for is the US government. However, the Masons didn’t have much to do with the founding of the government, other than the fact that many of the founders were Masons. If you knew much about the Freemasons, you would know that one thing they do is help out brethren in any way possible (which would explain why many important people in history are Freemasons).

As for the rest of my sarcastic points,

IMDb

Quotes from "Shooter"

Bob Lee Swagger: I don't think you understand, these boys killed my dog.

Lol this ones my favotie.

Nick Memphis: Bono? You want them to get Bono?

Read full topic
